# changeInLength

**Instance Property**

The difference between the current length of the edited range and its length before editing.

## Declaration

```swift
var changeInLength: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

This property reflects difference between the current length of the edited range and its length before editing began—that is, before the first call to the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSMutableAttributedString/beginEditing()] method or a single call to the[doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextStorage/edited(_:range:changeInLength:)] method. This difference is accumulated with each call to the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextStorage/edited(_:range:changeInLength:)] method, until the changes are finally processed.

The text storage object’s delegate and layout managers can use this information to determine the nature of edits in their respective notification methods.

## Determining the nature of changes

- **editedMask**: A mask that describes the kinds of edits pending for the text storage object.
- **editedRange**: The range of text that contains changes.
